reuze

Class dg_NQueensBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.dg_NQueensBoard

  • public class dg_NQueensBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a quadratic board with a matrix of squares on which queens can be placed (only one per square) and moved.
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, R. Lunde

        public void moveQueenTo(ga_XYLocation l)
        Moves the queen in the specified column (x-value of l) to the specified row (y-value of l). The action assumes a complete-state formulation of the n-queens problem.
        Parameters:
        l -
